snippet: MAIDMAN--Gail. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Gail Maidman. Gail's compassion and dedication helped to improve countless lives around the world. She leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Gail's beloved husband, Richard; her children, Evan (Regina) and Starr Kempin (Jacques), and stepchildren, Patrick, Mitchel (Arlene), and Dagny (Molly); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: MAIDMAN--Gail. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Gail Maidman. Gail's compassion and dedication helped to improve countless lives around the world. She leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Gail's beloved husband, Richard; her children, Evan (Regina) and Starr Kempin (Jacques), and stepchildren, Patrick, Mitchel (Arlene), and Dagny (Molly); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
